categories: Category:Sith of the New Sith Wars

nodes.text: Farh j'Hien was a Sith battlelord, who lived during the time of the Old Republic.

J'Hien served the Sith as a general. The Jedi Master Kei Loo Bross captured a Sith warrior who was bonded to j'Hien through Sith battlelord rituals and included the warrior's description of j'Hien in his work, Speculations on Tactics of the Sith.
